sense.gloss: to obey (an order, law, etc.), to abide by (a rule, custom, etc.), to follow, to observe, to conform to, to yield to
to follow (a person), to accompany, to go with
to go alongside (e.g. a river), to follow (e.g. a sign)

sdata.j: イエス↑振↑↓ふり↓↑反↑↓かえ↓りて、その↑從↑↓したが↓ひ↑來↑↓き↓たるを↑見↑↓み↓て↑言↑↓い↓ひ↑給↑↓たま↓ふ「↑何↑↓なに↓を↑求↑↓もと↓むるか」。
sdata.e: Turning around, Jesus saw them following and asked, "What do you want?"

words.gloss: to obey (an order, law, etc.), to abide by (a rule, custom, etc.), to follow, to observe, to conform to, to yield to
